item.title: Matt Corallo - Rust Lightning (2019-02-07)
item.description: Matt Corallo Flexible Lightning in Rust Video: https://vimeo.com/316624439 Slides: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/154bMWdcMCFUco4ZXQ3lWfF51U5dad8pQ23rKVkncnns/edit#slide=id.p https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1144256392490029057 Introduction Thanks for having me. I want to talk a little bit about a project I’ve been working on for about a year called rust-lightning. I started it in December so a year and a few months ago. This is my first presentation on it so I’m excited to finally get to talk about it a little bit. Goals It is yet another Lightning implementation because somehow we needed another one I guess or really not.
